Introduction.title: Code is creativity made real:
Introduction.description: As a Full Stack Developer, I build complete, scalable, and user-centric web applications. I transform ideas into innovative digital solutions, combining intuitive interfaces with robust architectures that generate real impact and add value to each project.

ServicesPage.description: As a Full Stack Developer and Systems Engineer, I offer complete digital solutions that cover the entire web application development cycle, from idea to implementation.

1.title: Full Stack Developer
1.subtitle: BeGreat
1.description: In February 2023, I collaborated with a team to develop a web system for managing courses, student and teacher enrollment, and more. Java with Spring Boot was used for the backend and ReactJS for the frontend, incorporating security libraries such as JWT.

2.title: Full Stack Developer
2.subtitle: Mobile App for Restaurant
2.description: In February 2024, I worked with a team to design a mobile application using MAUI .NET for the frontend and .NET for the backend, providing a smooth and modern experience for restaurant management.

3.title: Frontend Developer
3.subtitle: Ticket buying and exchange app
3.description: In July 2024, I collaborated in designing a cross-platform app for managing ticket buying and exchange, using Django for the backend, ReactJS for the web frontend, and React Native for the mobile version.

4.title: Frontend Developer
4.subtitle: Restaurant App
4.description: In November 2024, I developed the entire frontend for a restaurant app using ReactJS, ensuring intuitive and functional interfaces, collaborating closely with another developer.

5.title: Professional Internship
5.subtitle: Adnet Soluciones S.A.
5.description: In November 2024, I developed a Trello-style ticket management system using ReactJS, styling libraries like MUI, and connected it to Unsplash’s REST API for image consumption, contributing to a real-world project during my internship.

fullstack.title: Full Stack Development
fullstack.description: Building complete and scalable web applications, from frontend to backend, applying modern technologies and best practices.

frontend.title: Frontend Development
frontend.description: Design and development of responsive, intuitive interfaces focused on user experience, using ReactJS and modern frameworks.

backend.title: Backend Development
backend.description: Implementation of robust and secure server architectures, experienced with Java Spring Boot and .NET, ensuring performance and scalability.

database.title: Database Management
database.description: Design, optimization, and administration of SQL databases, ensuring data integrity, efficiency, and availability.

api.title: API Integration
api.description: Connecting applications with external APIs and third-party services such as REST APIs and Unsplash to enrich project functionality.

powerbi.title: Dashboards and Reports in Power BI
powerbi.description: Development of clear, interactive Power BI reports and dashboards for data-driven decision-making.

TechnologiesPage.java: Robust and object-oriented programming language, ideal for enterprise and backend applications.
TechnologiesPage.springboot: Java framework that simplifies the creation of microservices and scalable applications efficiently.
TechnologiesPage.javascript: Essential language for modern web development, used for creating dynamic and interactive interfaces.
TechnologiesPage.html: Markup language that structures web pages, ensuring accessibility and semantic consistency.
TechnologiesPage.css: Style language that enables the design of attractive, responsive, and device-adaptive interfaces.
TechnologiesPage.react: JavaScript library focused on building fast, scalable, and modular user interfaces.
TechnologiesPage.next: React framework that enables hybrid rendering (SSR and SSG) for modern web applications.
TechnologiesPage.mssql: Microsoft’s relational database management system, reliable for enterprise-grade projects.
TechnologiesPage.mysql: Widely used relational database known for its performance and stability in web applications.
TechnologiesPage.php: Programming language widely used for backend web development, especially for dynamic applications.
TechnologiesPage.laravel: Modern and elegant PHP framework that simplifies building secure and scalable applications.
TechnologiesPage.powerbi: Microsoft’s tool for data analysis and interactive visualization, ideal for business decision-making.
TechnologiesPage.dotnet: Microsoft framework for cross-platform development, supporting backend and desktop applications.
TechnologiesPage.tailwind: Utility-first CSS framework that enables fast and modern UI design customization.
